sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { ContactFormComponent } from './components/contact-form/contact-form.component'; import { PopupAdComponent } from './components/popup-ad/popup-ad.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, ContactFormComponent, PopupAdComponent], templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'ffuf-starter'; slides = [ { image: 'assets/Womens-Health-Community-Outreach.jpg', text: 'Empowering Women. Strengthening Communities. Transforming Lives.', subtext: 'Honoring the legacy of Francis and Felicia Umenyi through programs that advance women’s health, strengthen rural healthcare, and promote inclusion for all.' }, { image: 'assets/Community-Health.jpg', text: 'Promoting Rural Healthcare Access', subtext: 'Revitalizing local health centers and empowering communities with sustainable health solutions.' }, { image: 'assets/Food-Security.jpg', text: 'Nutrition and Food Security for All', subtext: 'Ensuring every child and mother has access to healthy food and nutritional support.' } ]; currentSlide = 0; ngOnInit(): void { setInterval(() => { this.nextSlide(); }, 5000); // Change every 5 seconds } nextSlide() { this.currentSlide = (this.currentSlide + 1) % this.slides.length; } prevSlide() { this.currentSlide = (this.currentSlide - 1 + this.slides.length) % this.slides.length; } }
Francis & Felicia Umenyi Foundation
About Focus Areas Impact Partners Donate
Menu

Empowering Women. Strengthening Communities. Transforming Lives.

Honoring the legacy of Francis and Felicia Umenyi through programs that advance women’s health, strengthen rural healthcare, and promote inclusion for all.

👉 Support Our Work 📖 Learn More About Us

A Legacy of Compassion and Service

The Francis & Felicia Umenyi Foundation (FFUF) was established in loving memory of Mr. Francis and Mrs. Felicia Ify Umenyi—two extraordinary Nigerians whose lives embodied compassion, service, and faith in humanity.

“We must do something to help those who cannot access the care I have.” — Mrs. Felicia Umenyi

That promise now defines our mission: ensuring no woman or family faces illness or hardship alone.

Our Vision

A world where every woman and child, regardless of background, disability, or economic status, can live healthy, dignified, and fulfilled lives.

Our Mission

We work to advance women’s health, strengthen community health systems, promote disability inclusion, and ensure food and nutrition security across rural and underserved areas in Nigeria.

Our Focus Areas

💗

Women’s Health & Cancer Awareness

Awareness, prevention, and early detection of breast and gynecological cancers.

🏥

Rural Health & PHC Adoption

Adoption and revitalization of primary health centers, starting with Gosa PHC in Abuja.

🍎

Nutrition & Food Security

Food drives and nutrition education for women and children facing hunger.

📚

Education, WASH & Child Health

Health education, menstrual hygiene, and sanitation programs in schools.

♿

Disability Inclusion

Rehabilitation, healthcare access, and advocacy for persons with disabilities.

Our Strategy

We create lasting impact through strengthening existing community structures, building partnerships with government, NGOs, and private sector organizations, and empowering women and communities as agents of change.

Our Impact (So Far)

🏥

Gosa PHC Revitalized

Serving thousands annually

💕

Cancer Screenings

Free screenings, wigs & counseling for hundreds of women

🍲

Community Food Drives

Supported 500+ families

🚸

School WASH Programs

Improved sanitation & menstrual hygiene

♿

Disability Outreach

Inclusive health outreach in FCT

🤝

Partnerships

FaithCare & CONAC Foundation collaborations

Partnerships & Collaboration

FFUF partners with international agencies, embassies, foundations, corporations, and NGOs to scale access to health, nutrition, and empowerment programs.

Interested in partnering? Contact Us

Join Us in Empowering Lives

Support our programs through donations, partnerships, or volunteering.

Our Legacy

Their hearts inspired the mission. Their legacy drives the work. Their story lives on through every woman and community we serve.

Join Us in Empowering Lives

Support our programs through donations, partnerships, or volunteering.

Donate Now Partner With Us
Francis & Felicia Umenyi Foundation © 2025
Enduring Legacy. Enriching Lives. 📍 Abuja, Nigeria
